description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，为现任以色列总理及执政党利库德集团主席。其为以色列自1948年建国以来任期最长的总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician serving as the current prime minister of Israel and chairman of the Likud party. He is the longest-serving prime minister in the country's history since its founding in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的右翼政党。
description.en: A right-wing political party in Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理及总统。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as Prime Minister and President of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，曾任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 波兰犹太裔历史教授，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的父亲。
description.en: A Polish-born Israeli historian, father of Benjamin Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 以色列特种部队军官，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的长兄，在恩德培行动中阵亡。
description.en: An Israeli special forces officer, Benjamin Netanyahu's older brother, who was killed in action during Operation Entebbe.

description.zh-cn: 以色列心理学家，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的第三任妻子。
description.en: An Israeli psychologist, the third wife of Benjamin Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦解放组织领导人。
description.en: Leader of the Palestine Liberation Organization.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦伊斯兰抵抗运动组织。
description.en: A Palestinian Sunni-Islamic fundamentalist organization.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第44任总统。
description.en: The 44th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由内塔尼亚胡政府于2023年1月提出的司法系统改革方案，旨在削减司法部门对行政的影响力。
description.en: A judicial reform plan proposed by the Netanyahu government in January 2023, aimed at reducing the judiciary's influence over the executive branch.

description.zh-cn: 针对2023年以色列司法改革方案的持续性示威活动。
description.en: A series of ongoing protests against the 2023 Israeli judicial reform.

description.zh-cn: 为应对以色列—哈马斯战争而紧急成立的联合政府。
description.en: An emergency unity government formed in response to the Israel–Hamas war.

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院检察官。
description.en: Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court.

description.zh-cn: 以色列国防部部长。
description.en: Israel's Minister of Defense.

nodes.id: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令

zh-cn: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令
en: International Criminal Court arrest warrants for Benjamin Netanyahu et al.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗与P5+1国家就伊朗核计划达成的协议。
description.en: An agreement on the Iranian nuclear program reached between Iran and the P5+1 countries.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国众议院议长。
description.en: An American politician who served as the Speaker of the United States House of Representatives.

nodes.id: 巴勒斯坦民族权力机构

zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦民族权力机构

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物和退役将军。
description.en: An Israeli politician and retired army general.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物。
description.en: An Israeli politician.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的民族主义政党。
description.en: A nationalist political party in Israel.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡接替亚伊尔·拉皮德成为以色列总理。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu succeeded Yair Lapid as Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 纳夫塔利·贝内特接替本雅明·内塔尼亚胡成为以色列总理，结束了后者长达12年的执政。
description.en: Naftali Bennett succeeded Benjamin Netanyahu as Prime Minister of Israel, ending his 12-year rule.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡接替埃胡德·奥尔默特成为以色列总理。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu succeeded Ehud Olmert as Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡在1996年大选中击败并接替时任总理希蒙·佩雷斯。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu defeated and succeeded incumbent Prime Minister Shimon Peres in the 1996 election.

description.zh-cn: 埃胡德·巴拉克在1999年大选中击败并接替本雅明·内塔尼亚胡成为以色列总理。
description.en: Ehud Barak defeated and succeeded Benjamin Netanyahu as Prime Minister of Israel in the 1999 election.

description.zh-cn: 约纳坦·内塔尼亚胡是本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的长兄。
description.en: Yonatan Netanyahu was Benjamin Netanyahu's older brother.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡不信任巴勒斯坦解放组织领导人亚西尔·阿拉法特，并在和平进程中对他采取强硬立场。
description.en: Netanyahu distrusted PLO leader Yasser Arafat and took a hardline stance against him in the peace process.

position.en: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Minister of Finance

description.zh-cn: 在沙龙政府中先后担任外交部长和财政部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and later Minister of Finance in Sharon's government.

description.zh-cn: 自特朗普政府上任后，美以关系明显好转，特朗普采取了亲以色列的立场。
description.en: Since the Trump administration took office, US-Israel relations significantly improved, with Trump adopting a pro-Israel stance.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡被指与奥巴马政府关系欠佳，双方在两国方案及以色列定居点问题上存在分歧。
description.en: Netanyahu reportedly had a poor relationship with the Obama administration, with disagreements on the two-state solution and Israeli settlements.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡政府于2023年1月公布了司法改革方案。
description.en: The Netanyahu government unveiled the judicial reform plan in January 2023.

description.zh-cn: 司法改革方案引发了广泛的批评和连串示威活动。
description.en: The judicial reform plan sparked widespread criticism and a series of protest movements.

description.zh-cn: 哈马斯等武装组织于2023年10月对以色列发动突然袭击，引发了战争。
description.en: Hamas and other militant groups launched a surprise attack on Israel in October 2023, triggering the war.

description.zh-cn: 为应对战争，内塔尼亚胡与各党紧急成立了战时内阁。
description.en: In response to the war, Netanyahu and various parties formed an emergency war cabinet.

relationships.target: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院检察官卡里姆·艾哈迈德汗申请对内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令。
description.en: ICC Prosecutor Karim Ahmad Khan applied for arrest warrants for Netanyahu and others.

relationships.target: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院于2024年11月21日正式签发对内塔尼亚胡和加兰特的逮捕令。
description.en: The ICC formally issued arrest warrants for Netanyahu and Gallant on November 21, 2024.

relationships.source: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令
国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡反对与伊朗和解，并指控其支持恐怖主义活动。
description.en: Netanyahu opposes reconciliation with Iran and accuses it of supporting terrorist activities.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡在美国国会发表演讲，公开批评并试图阻止美国与伊朗达成核协议。
description.en: Netanyahu delivered a speech to the U.S. Congress, publicly criticizing and attempting to block the nuclear deal with Iran.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国众议院议长约翰·博纳邀请内塔尼亚胡到美国国会就伊朗核协议发表演讲。
description.en: Then-Speaker of the House John Boehner invited Netanyahu to address the U.S. Congress regarding the Iran nuclear deal.

relationships.target: 巴勒斯坦民族权力机构

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡不信任巴勒斯坦民族权力机构，并对其采取强硬态度。
description.en: Netanyahu distrusts the Palestinian National Authority and adopts a hardline stance towards it.

description.zh-cn: 2017年4月，内塔尼亚胡访问中国，纪念两国建交25周年。
description.en: In April 2017, Netanyahu visited China to commemorate the 25th anniversary of diplomatic relations.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡与政治对手本尼·甘茨同意组建联合政府。
description.en: Netanyahu and his political rival Benny Gantz agreed to form a unity government.

description.zh-cn: 由于与阿维格多·利伯曼领导的以色列是我们的家园党在服兵役问题上无法达成一致，内塔尼亚胡在2019年4月选举后组阁失败。
description.en: Netanyahu failed to form a coalition after the April 2019 election due to disagreements with Avigdor Lieberman's Yisrael Beiteinu party over the issue of military conscription.
